thread.title: Soon people will be able to fold their home instead of sleeping in the cold (7 Photos)
thread.title_full: Soon people will be able to fold their home instead of sleeping in the cold (7 Photos)

author: Jeff
title: Soon people will be able to fold their home instead of sleeping in the cold (7 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
What may be a godsend to the homeless population around the world, or a smart gimmick from a modern artist; the foldable house is a modern way to pitch a tent. 2 
Small enough to fit in your pocket but inflatable to liveable sizes, the “Basic House” comes from the mind of Barcelona based designer Martin Azua. 3 
The material traps heat in cold weather, and breathes in cool air when it is hot. It inflates like a travel couch, which a swish of the arms and then you step inside. 4 
It is only conceptual now, the actual prototype is a museum piece. But there is potential for a trendy entrepreneur to help a lot of people, or maybe just a few campers. 5
